title: Sanjay Gupta's 'Jazbaa' combines style with substance
text:
I am a traveller at heart. My love for the road, for my bikes all stems from there. And it is with the same spirit that I make my films.
READ: 'Jazbaa' packs in thrills, emotions and a nail-biting suspense
Each film for me is a journey. Some are more eventful than others. Each journey has a set of its own magical memories that linger long after the journey is over. Jazbaa is definitely amongst the most memorable ones.
Cinema is always a combination of style and substance. Often when any one is heavy on the other, the film suffers. Jazbaa is the perfect marriage between the two. A very strong and powerful story, which is extremely relevant given the times that we live in, told with a certain amount of visual flare and panache.
The film is supported by a team of renowned actors like Shabana Azmi, Jackie Shroff, Atul Kulkarni, Chandan Roy Sanyal, Abhimanyu Singh along with Aishwarya and Irrfan. Clearly a dream ensemble for any director. Just watching all of them perform at the top of their game is a treat to the eyes.
The music in a Hindi mainstream film is what makes it unique and immortal. ' Bandeyaa' and ' Jaane tere shehar ' are songs that will be around for a long long time to come.
Rarely do films come into your life that become an integral part of you. The story of Jazbaa is inspired from the Korean film Sebeun Deijeu . The content of Jazbaa , the story is an extremely powerful and relevant one, which has been told in the format of an edgy thriller , which means great amount of style has also gone into storytelling, making the same a very unique movie-going experience.
Jazbaa produced by Zee Studios, Viiking Media and Entertainment and White Feather Films, releases worldwide today.
-- by Sanjay Gupta
